meanings.definition: A composition of text and images arranged on a sheet of paper for printing.
meanings.sent1: The pasteup for the magazine cover looked colorful and attractive.
meanings.sent2: The graphic designer carefully arranged the pasteup before sending it to the printer.
meanings.sent3: The pasteup of the birthday card made the recipient smile.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity turned the pasteup into a work of art.
meanings.sent5: The pasteup captured the essence of the company's brand perfectly.

meanings.definition: To create a pasteup by arranging text and images on a sheet of paper.
meanings.sent1: She pasteuped the photos and text neatly on the poster.
meanings.sent2: The students pasteuped their project with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: He decided to pasteup a funny meme on his office door.
meanings.sent4: Her mind pasteuped memories like a scrapbook of moments.
meanings.sent5: The artist pasteuped a masterpiece that caught everyone's attention.
